message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes packed with features that ensure efficiency and reliability. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional product, I am offering it at $150. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. While we usually aim to maintain our pricing, I'm willing to negotiate further. For this high-quality product, I propose a price of $130. This allows us to cover our costs while still being competitive in the market. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
